text: @senatemajldr @JudyWoodruff @NewsHour There is no safe way to open schools! Kids will spread coronavirus just like they do with every other bug they pick up every year! Kids are the primary spreaders of influenza, measles, chicken pox and lice! They won’t keep a mask on or wash their hands!
